2. The Angel 
No safe word can protect the heart
Infamous erotica author and accomplished dominatrix Nora Sutherlin is doing something utterly out of character: hiding. While her longtime lover, SÃƒÂ¸renÃ¢â‚¬â€whose fetishes, if exposed, would be his ruinÃ¢â‚¬â€is under scrutiny pending a major promotion, Nora's lying low and away from temptation in the lap of luxury. Her host, the wealthy and uninhibited Griffin Fiske, is thrilled to have Nora stay at his country estate, especially once he meets her traveling companion. Young, inexperienced and angelically beautiful, Michael has become Nora's protÃƒÂ©gÃƒÂ©, and this summer with Griffin is going to be his training, where the hazing never ends. 3. The Prince 
Two worlds of wealth and passion call to Nora Sutherlin and, whichever one she chooses, it will be the hardest decision she will ever have to make. Unless someone makes it for herÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Wes Railey is the object of Nora's tamest yet most maddening fantasies, and the one man she can't forget. He's young. He's wonderful. He's also thoroughbred royalty and, reuniting with him in Kentucky, she's in his world now. But this infamous New York dominatrix is no simpering Southern belle, and Nora's dream of fitting into Wesley's world is perpetually at odds with the relentlessly seductive pull of SÃƒÂ¸renÃ¢â‚¬â€her owner, her lover, the forever she cannot have. At least, not completely. Meanwhile Nora's associate Kingsley Edge is only too happy to take her place at SÃƒÂ¸ren's feet during her hiatus. SÃƒÂ¸ren is the only man Kingsley has ever loved, and their dark, shared history has forged a bond that neither the yearsÃ¢â‚¬â€nor SÃƒÂ¸ren's love for NoraÃ¢â‚¬â€can break. But a new threat from an old adversary is forcing Kingsley to confront the past, reminding him that he must keep his friends close, and his enemies closer.
